review:
I went for my brother in law suffering from oral issues.
Dr CS Mani took all efforts to explain the issue as well take us into the procedure involved. Dr CS Mani helped us to get mentally prepared for the treatment and gave mental strength. His method is very positive oriented and not negative at all.

*** **** ****** *** *** *** *** an amazing person. Words fall short to describe this ********* doctor. Once you consult him, all your worries and concern will simply disappear and you will get healed and not just cured.
